articles.title: COVID slams CEO pay packets back to 2007 levels - ABC News
articles.description: Australia's best-paid executives have been hit in the back pocket, with boards trimming million-dollar packages and killing 2020 bonuses.
articles.content:
COVID smashed the pay packets of Australian chief executives, with remuneration last financial year falling to its lowest level since 2007.
